title: RealPlayer 10 Mac OS X (BBC Ad-Free Version)
description:
We all hate RealPlayer, but sometimes there is a file you want to see/watch that
is only available in RealPlayer format. This is the BBC Ad-Free version of the 
application for Mac OS X, that lets you play RealMedia without all the extra 
worthless add-ons and advertising. Simply Unzip the file and copy it to your
Applications folder. Enjoy!!

Language: English
Platform: Mac OS X
